hyperparameters.name: nr_freqs_to_keep
hyperparameters.short_desc: The total number of frequencies that will be used for forecasting.

hyperparameters.name: trend
hyperparameters.short_desc: If set, indicates what kind of detrending will be applied before performing DFT. Possible values: 'poly', 'exp' or None, for polynomial trend, exponential trend or no trend, respectively.

hyperparameters.name: trend_poly_degree
hyperparameters.short_desc: The degree of the polynomial that will be used for detrending, if trend='poly'.
